flavor: Your clan resides in one of the city-states, where its members are respected as expert artisans or engineers. Perhaps you left the clan after striking back against the oppression of the templars or nobles, or maybe you discovered that you had no passion for the work and left to find your fortune elsewhere. What trade do your kin followâ€”are they armorers, stonemasons, or well diggers? Are they free or slave, poor or well-off? Why did you leave?
name: Skilled Artisan
